document.full_text: disgraced former illinois governor rod blagojevich did not want to mix fundraising and governing, a former aide said on monday, but other witnesses said political donations and government favors were linked.
document.title: blagojevich trial hears differing views on alleged favors
lines_and_colors: disgraced former illinois governor rod blagojevich did not want to mix fundraising and governing, a former aide said on monday, but other witnesses said political donations and government favors were linked.
